website_summaries.verdict: The Dayton Audio T652-AIR minitower speakers give good performance for very little money.
pros: The Dayton Audio T652-AIR offers performance that belies its ultracheap price
The fit and finish are better than you would expect and the inclusion of an AIR tweeter is unusual for this kind of money
cons: They don't go very loud without distorting, and only come with spring clips for attaching speaker wire
The cheaper Dayton Audio MK402 is a better buy

customer_reviews.title: pair them with good clean power and you will be blown away
customer_reviews.text: I come from an audio background of McIntosh Amplification and very high end speakers Revel, Paradigm, B & W, Focal, etc. It takes alot to Wow me but these speakers are unbelievable for the money, pair them with good clean power and you will be blown away. I give them my highest recommendation for a low cost pair of tower speakers. You will not be disappointed. Bravo Dayton Audio !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Russell

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are fantastic! I bought a receiver that can calibrate the ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are fantastic! I bought a receiver that can calibrate the speakers and tune the room with parametric EQ auto and manual adjustments. Made these speakers sound like a million bucks!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers when placed on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I am something of an audiophile, have worked in sound recording and reinforcement, and have built several speaker cabinets with great success. I have had good experience with Dayton Audio products in the past and thought at this price I would be good deal.. My first version of this review panned these speakers as heavy in upper midrange and deficient in bass. But once I did what the manufacturer suggests and placed them on the floor, things really improved. The tweeters are just a little below my ears, but the highs are fine. The bass is noticeably boosted and the harsh midrange is attenuated. They are good for the price. They look nice with the covers on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this tower speakers, had the regular T652 and love them but this the sound quality that comes out of the tweeter is out of this world and the dual woofers to add on top of that. The best speaker's i have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Rock_Lee

customer_reviews.title: awesome set of little speakers.
customer_reviews.text: my first impression was that they weren't as clear as the polk speakers i was replacing. but after breaking them in for a bit they sound great. not sure if that's because i broke them in properly or if i just forgot what my old speakers used to sound like. either way, you won't regret getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Rixter

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. Hooked it up to a 25 year old receiver and brings my movie watching experience to a whole new level. I didn’t want to spend tons of money on speakers but also didn’t want junk. I have no regrets and if you want good speakers for a affordable price the just click buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I paired two of these speakers with a Yamaha RX-V381 Natural Sound 5.1-Channel Home Theater Bluetooth Receiver (I think 260 or 280 watts total, can't remember). I use this system in my garage. These speakers pack more bass than I thought they would and can shake the walls. The AIR functionality is awesome as plenty of air flows from these speakers at louder volumes. The sound is pretty clean, and overall, I'm giving these a 4.5 out of 5 based off the value and quality combination. I'm happy with this purchase and will continue rocking out.
customer_reviews.author: Laser203

customer_reviews.title: Daytona
customer_reviews.text: Just buy them! They don't take up too much space. They have a some look. They sound great. And they are priced great! Go, Go, Go!
customer_reviews.author: PORTAL WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for an unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are outstanding; I honestly can’t believe how affordable they are. The design looks clean, with and without the front screen. They look and handle smaller than the size description states, and the sound easily fills up our living area (15’x30’). I bought these as the first stage of a new home stereo configuration, but I don’t think I need any further sub or tweeters - these two speakers are enough. I read a couple reviews that suggested they sound weak, but I strongly disagree. For much less cheddar than a far worse Bluetooth monitor, I’d go with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome. They will surprise you how good they sound. They have descent bass; however, with my Bic F12(sub), Bic DV62CLR-S(center) and Polk T-15(rear-surrounds), I have an awesome theater system on a budget. My receiver is an Onkyo TX S373. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are very impressive especially for the price. I use them as my front left and right speakers in my 5.1 setup. I replaced my original 2 way Cerwin Vega’s. Much better sound. I have a 10” Cerwin Vega sub to do the bass. The combination sounds awesome! Without the sub thr is bass loss but you have to realize that if you want a lot of bass, any 6.5” mid bass speakers will lack in that department.
customer_reviews.author: michael rutledge

customer_reviews.title: A lot of kick in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Good sound & dont take up a bunch of room. I had OLD big bulky speakers I inherited from my dad that were easily from the 60's-70's. These take up a lot less room & kick!! The sound is great! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Sound very clean and dynamic
customer_reviews.text: I use these as two fronts for a surround system they sound great. They are best when paired with a sub. I love the Dayton speakers. I also use the smaller speakers for back channels.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R. Walzer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Won't be dissappointed. Very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I like the speakers for my stereo. They have a very good sound for an inexpensive product. I highly recommend them to others who appreciate quality sound that inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Great little tower speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like these little rascals, they sound great .I listen to LP, they sound great, I listen to cd, these sound great, I like Blu ray disc, these sound great . to me there no down side. try them out for yourself, you will see.
customer_reviews.author: jerry millerj

customer_reviews.title: This item works well and is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting audio heaven but, they do fill my needs for frontal surround speakers. Good quality and all lives matter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Great small floorstanding speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from small floor standing speakers. Midrange and bass are far above average.
customer_reviews.author: pepin

customer_reviews.title: a great buy
customer_reviews.text: not sure you can get better speakers at this price, and these DA speakers outperformed my previous $1000 a pair high-end speakers
customer_reviews.author: John Lankford

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT PRODUCT, timming, for the price that i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELENT PRODUCT, timming, for the price that i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Carmona

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the wood the cabinets are made of are so thin that different freq reverb through the wood or vibrates sound crappy need to use a sub base
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t built really well but what you get for the money it’sa no brainier. Keep them out of the sun or there veneer will wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for short money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for short money, using as fronts in a home theater setup and they're great
customer_reviews.author: Neal D.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers at a very affordable price. Clean and crisp and all around great sound
customer_reviews.author: Gene Brierton

customer_reviews.title: great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and goes great with my 15 inch power subwoofer!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.  Seriously good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review things, but this was worth dropping a note. I was more than surprised at the audio quality for the money. The BASS was honestly much more than I expected. Most people won't need an extra sub with these for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and value
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good and good value for money compared to alternatives out there
customer_reviews.author: Patrick N

customer_reviews.title: Great tone!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great product. Just what my vinyl system needed. Very happy with purchase:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: The upgraded tweeters are totally worth getting. Sounds amazing. Definitely get a sub to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Fisher

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint. Better lows, midrange and overall result than the b562 which are great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my rear speakers for my home theater system and they do sound good
customer_reviews.author: Russ

product_meta.title: Dayton Audio T652-AIR Dual 6-1/2" 2-Way Tower Speaker Pair with AMT Tweeter
product_meta.description: Enjoy the light and airy high frequencies from the Dayton Audio T652-AIR tower speakers. Featuring the same design DNA as the B652-AIR speaker from Dayton Audio, the T652-AIR model incorporates dual woofers into a compact bass-reflex tower cabinet, for unobtrusive yet modern aesthetics and incredibly deep bass, and features an AMT tweeter for an extended frequency range. Like the B652-AIR, the T652-AIR is all about giving you the most performance for your money while offering a little something extra from the fantastic AMT tweeter.
feature_bullets: Dual 6-1/2" woofers provide superb bass response and punch
1" AMT tweeter for smooth, accurate reproduction
Slim-profile tower cabinet won't overwhelm your room
Ported bass-reflex design delivers extended, deep bass to 45 Hz
Clarity and detail that is exceptional in this price class

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars86 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
